alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Braxton; Gilmer; Harrison; Lewis; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Randolph; Taylor; Upshur (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 10:47AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northwestern Randolph, Taylor, east central Gilmer, Lewis, north central Braxton, northern Upshur, Barbour and Harrison Counties through 1145 AM EST... At 1046 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Enterprise to 8 miles east of Cedar Creek State Park. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarksburg, Buckhannon, Grafton, Weston, Philippi, Audra State Park, Bridgeport, Shinnston, Belington, Stonewood, Nutter Fort, Lumberport, Anmoore, Jackson Mill, Stonewall Jackson, Enterprise, West Milford, Junior, Burnsville and Lost Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 78 and 128. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 70 and 82. Route 33 between mile markers 1 and 17, and between mile markers 34 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Barbour; Braxton; Gilmer; Harrison; Lewis; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Randolph; Taylor; Upshur
